reviewText: The story is funny and to see the only movie about the Caliente casino in Tijuana is very nice.

This was a gift for my mom, for the Casino where the film was filmed at, she remember it just as it was, for it was turned into a school. She does like the story, simple funny old B&W movie. I did enjoyed it :)
Historically important because it was filmed on location at the original caliente casino in Tijuana Mexico

This was a nice little Busby Berkeley musical with Pat O'Brien and Edward Evert Horton south of the border trying to get away from gold digger Glenda Farrell. They don't make movies like this any more.
This movie is an oldie but I enjoyed it.  Delores Del Rio is so beautiful in it. Because of it's age it looks it but the remastering is pretty good.
